attributes.action: Deport all illegal immigrants that have came here by boats
attributes.additional_details: If the public take it into their own hands we will get prosecuted because we have broke the law. Just put them on a god damn plane and send them back. 99% of the ones that are coming are fighting age men and they have different  values to what we do in our culture we don't want the barbaric nature of their beliefs  in this country. Why are you the government  blindly  letting them in and paying for them the issue needs sorting. We have our elderly  that need this money your spending on these
attributes.background: Stop using taxpayers money to house illegal immigrants who have broke the law by invading the shores the way they have done. Send them back we don't know who any of them are as they arrive with no identification what so ever. What did our great grandparents die for ?

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/703195
